price: 29. Ir jei kuris iš jų sakytų: „Iš tiesų, aš esu ilah (dievas) šalia Jo (Allaho)“, tokiam Mes atlygintume Pragaru. Taip Mes atsilyginame Zalimūn (daugiadieviams ir bloga darantiems).
arabic: ۞ وَمَن يَقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِلَٰهٞ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waman yaqul min'hum innī ilāhun min dūnihi fadhālika najzīhi jahannama kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
